Thank you for opening a Pull Request! Before submitting your PR, there are a few things you can do to make sure it goes smoothly: - [ ] Make sure to open an issue as a bug/issue before writing your code! That way we can discuss the change, evaluate designs, and agree on the general idea - [ ] Ensure the tests and linter pass - [ ] Code coverage does not decrease (if any source code was changed) - [ ] Appropriate docs were updated (if necessary)
